subject: Move 'Assign to Cells' to follow image selection
body:
The cell assignment is the primary action after selecting an image,
so it now appears immediately after selection rather than at the end.
Adds a visual separator between assignment and image settings.

https://claude.ai/code/session_011t8A1VyRs9GFv25XuBsaRN
title: Move 'Assign to Cells' to follow image selection
